Call of Iron.name: Call of Iron
Call of Iron.flavor: As you strike your foe, you awaken within your allies’ weapons and armor the indomitable power of iron.
Call of Iron.runeOfDestruction: Until the end of your next turn, each ally who hits the target with a weapon attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
Call of Iron.runeOfProtection: Each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to AC, or a +4 power bonus if the ally is wearing heavy armor. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.

Fury of the Forge.name: Fury of the Forge
Fury of the Forge.flavor: As your weapon crashes into your foe, you call on the forge rune to scorch that enemy
Fury of the Forge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Fury of the Forge.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
Fury of the Forge.effect: Until the target saves against the ongoing fire damage, your allies deal 1d6 extra fire damage when they hit it with melee attacks.

Blessing of the Forge.name: Blessing of the Forge
Blessing of the Forge.flavor: At your touch, your ally’s armor gains unmatched strength, causing even the mightiest blow to bounce off it.
Blessing of the Forge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +2 power bonus to AC, or a +4 power bonus if the target is wearing heavy armor.
Blessing of the Forge.special: You can use this power only once per round.
